original_text: When God saw what they did and how they turned from their evil ways, he relented and did not bring on them the destruction he had threatened.
korean_text: 하나님이 그들이 행한 것 곧 그 악한 길에서 돌이켜 떠난 것을 보시고 하나님이 뜻을 돌이키사 그들에게 내리리라고 말씀하신 재앙을 내리지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: When God saw what they did
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그들이 행한 바를 보셨을 때

sentences.original_text: and how they turned from their evil ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 악한 길에서 떠난 것을 보시고

sentences.original_text: and did not bring on them the destruction
